```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)

if (!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman")
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, knitr, lubridate)

# Utility functions from:
# https://github.com/mfherman/westchester-covid/blob/master/R/build/utils.R

day_month_year <- function(x, abbr = FALSE) {
  if(all(lubridate::is.Date(x) || lubridate::is.POSIXt(x))) {
  glue::glue("{lubridate::day(x)} {lubridate::month(x, label = TRUE, abbr = abbr)} {lubridate::year(x)}")
  } else
    stop("Input vector must be Date or POSIX format.")
}

pretty_time <- function(x) {
  if(all(lubridate::is.POSIXt(x))) {
  paste(as.numeric(format(x, "%I")), format(x, "%M %p"), sep = ":")
  } else
    stop("Input vector must be POSIX format.")
}

```

  <div class = "index-column-r l-page" style = "font-size:1.2rem;line-height:1.2em;font-family:'Lato', sans-serif;">

This site provides stats on the [Lichess4545](https://www.lichess4545.com) online chess leagues.

Here, you'll find [detailed reports](season_stats.html) on every season of the Team (4545), LoneWolf and Chess960 leagues. Each report gives an overview of the season, shows various key trends/measures, and recognises noteworthy performances through some quirkily-named awards. For ease of reference, a separate [page](reports/awards_search.html) provides a searchable table with all the award winners from every season of each league.

In addition, there are also standalone statistical articles on various league-related themes, like my effort to identify the [global distribution of league players](countries.html) based on Lichess profile flags. I plan to publish more articles like this in the near future.
